SourceProxy.name: GMFReader
SourceProxy.label: GMF reader

Documentation.long_help: Read a mesh/meshb file and optionally a sol/solb file.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The GMF reader reads GAMMA Mesh Format (INRIA) files, and the output is an unstructured grid.

StringVectorProperty.name: Mesh File
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the mesh file name for the GMF reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: Solution File
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the solution file name for the GMF reader.
